description: After arranging shipment (v2.logistics.ship_order) for the integrated channel, use this api to get the tracking_number, which is a required parameter for creating shipping labels. The api response can return tracking_number empty, since this info is dependent from the 3PL, due to this it is allowed to keep calling the api within 5 minutes interval, until the tracking_number is returned.

query.name: package_list
query.description: The list of packages you want to get tracking number. limit [1, 50].

query.name: package_number
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

query.name: response_optional_fields
query.description: Indicate response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: plp_number, first_mile_tracking_number,last_mile_tracking_number.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

schema.name: tracking_number
schema.description: The tracking number of this order.

schema.name: plp_number
schema.description: The unique identifier for package of BR correios.

schema.name: first_mile_tracking_number
schema.description: The first mile tracking number of the order. Only for Cross Border Seller

schema.name: last_mile_tracking_number
schema.description: The last mile tracking number of the order. Only for Cross Border BR seller.

schema.name: hint
schema.sample: Buyers CVS closed waiting for buyer to reselect another CVS storesauto cancel time 2021-01-01
schema.description: Indicate hint information if cannot get some fields under special scenarios. For example, cannot get tracking_number when cvs store is closed.

schema.name: pickup_code
schema.description: For drivers to quickly identify parcel to be picked up. Only returned for instant+sameday orders.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

error_codes.message: Package is not under the specified fulfilment channel
Package is not under the specified warehouse
